articles.content:
Shortly before outlining a new design for an interplanetary transport system to take humans to Mars, SpaceX CEO Elon Musk shared an artists impression of a rocket and a city on the Red Planet. 
Musk… [+1427 chars]

articles.author: Indo Asian News Service
articles.title: SpaceX’s new rocket to ferry Elon Musk’s Tesla Roadster to Mars - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Falcon Heavy is a more powerful rocket that SpaceX hopes to use for missions to the Moon and Mars.
articles.content: SpaceX CEO Elon Musk has announced that the first flight of his companys Falcon Heavy rocket will carry a Tesla Roadster -- touted as the quickest car in the world with record-setting acceleration, r… [+1348 chars]
